Posts.Content: Jan 9, 2009 12:34PM MTT66 wrote: Best of luck to you as well DM:-) Strange coincidence-I also discovered a lump on my left breast about two months ago and waited until this week to call the doctor.  I waited until I went through a couple of cycles to see if there were any changes.  I had a routine mamm back in September.  Next Tuesday I am scheduled for an ultrasound & another mamm, focussing primarily on the area where the lump is located.  I don't have a history of BC in my family however there is a long history of cancer on both paternal & maternal sides. Hoping for the best and keeping my fingers crossed for you
Posts.Title: Went to Doctor today DaughterMom DaughterMom
